title: Game of Thrones Quiz v1.2 Android
description:
Quiz (trivia) was created on the basis of series of the HBO station entitled Game of Thrones. TV series is an adaptation of the great saga of books written by George R.R. Martin - A Song of Ice and Fire. Quiz questions concern ONLY elements that were mentioned in the TV series! Questions with various level of difficulty will enable you to complete your knowledge on the series and provide you with entertainment. Check your knowledge on the TV series!


Our Quiz (trivia) offers:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More than 160 questions!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3 game modes - Classic, Sudden Death, Time Challenge! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Points depending on time and amount of correct answers - which one of your friends will get the biggest amount of points?
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Plenty of configuration options!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ "Submit question" option - you can send a questions, that after moderation, may appear in game!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Possibility to choose a season - Even if you are not up to date with the series, it is not a problem! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Two language versions: Polish and English!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Completely free game!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And much more...

Game modes:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In Classic mode, the user answers 15 questions connected with the series. The time to answer every question is limited. The user is granted points for a correct answer. The amount of obtained points is influenced by the time of answer and level of difficulty chosen in options. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In the Sudden Death mode, the user answers 30 questions, but in case of incorrect answer, he/she loses. The time to answer every question is limited and if it is exceeded, the game is over. The user receives points for every correct answer. The amount of received points depends on the time of answer and chosen level of difficulty.  
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In the Time Challenge, the user answers 30 questions. The total time to answer ALL questions is limited (correct answer adds some additional time), and if exceeded, the game is over. Incorrect answer does not stop the game.
